title: ChatGPT Proficiency for Non-Coders: From Basics to Breakthroughs
description: This idea is selected as it is well-targeted for non-coders, ensuring accessibility to advanced features without requiring coding skills. It offers a balanced mix of theory and practical application through interactive labs and group discussions. The detailed focus on specific plugins and extensions enhances technical depth, aligning with the target audience's needs. The clear, actionable steps and strategic planning ensure the course is feasible within the 3-day duration. The inclusion of a refined technical roadmap with module examples or case study walkthroughs provides a comprehensive learning experience.
